title: Handle Failed Payment Transaction
description: An automated alert flags an order where the customer's payment was declined. An agent needs to contact the customer to resolve it.

tasks.description: Identify the order with the failed payment and the reason for the decline (e.g., 'Insufficient Funds').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the order and the specific payment gateway error message.

tasks.description: Send an email to the customer notifying them of the payment issue and providing a secure link to update their payment information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a clear and helpful email to the customer.

tasks.description: Place a temporary hold on the order's inventory allocation until the payment is resolved.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prevents the items from being sold to someone else while payment is pending.
